title: Over 20,000 Mississippi students in Covid quarantine after first week of school
content:
1. Over 20,000 Mississippi students in Covid quarantine after first week of school  NBC News
  2. Mississippi health leaders discuss growing COVID-19 infections in state  WJTV 12 News
  3. Mississippi daily COVID-19 cases top 4,000 on Wednesday as 20,000 students quarantine  Clarion Ledger
  4. Health Officials Provide Covid-19 Update  16 WAPT News Jackson
  5. Mississippi's top doctor says COVID is far worse than it's ever been in the state  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 开学第一周后，超过2万名密西西比州的学生处于Covid隔离状态
開學第一週後，超過2萬名密西西比州的學生處於Covid隔離狀態
2万人以上のミシシッピ州の学生が学校開始後、Covid隔離される
